title: Manage Conveyor Transfer Chute
description: An operator notices that a transfer chute between two conveyor belts is blocked, causing ore to spill.

tasks.description: Acknowledge the 'Chute Blocked' alarm from the control system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator is aware of the blockage.

tasks.description: Immediately stop the feeding conveyor to prevent more material from being spilled.
tasks.expected_outcome: The conveyor is stopped, limiting the size of the spill.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority work order for a maintenance crew to safely clear the blockage and clean up the spill.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is created to resolve the issue and get the conveyor system running again.
